title: How to Add Forums to a Website

steps.headline: Set up the forum on a forum service providers website (Google for it and select one you like)
Get the HTML code (one shown in screen-shot) to embed it on your website and that's it your forum is live.
Get a Forum Software package like phpBB, Vanilla, MyBB or vBulletin(or something similar).
Install the software with appropriate database and settings(get help from script providers website)
Once done, link your forum to your website.

tyn: Admin access to hosting control panel.
